join: location left join patent_inventor using(location_id) left join patent using(patent_id)
left join inventor using(inventor_id) left outer join location_inventor on location.location_id=location_inventor.location_id and inventor.inventor_id=location_inventor.inventor_id
left outer join inventor_rawinventor on inventor_rawinventor.patent_id = patent.patent_id

left join patent_assignee on location.location_id=patent_assignee.location_id left join assignee using(assignee_id) left outer join location_assignee on location.location_id=location_assignee.location_id and assignee.assignee_id=location_assignee.assignee_id

left outer join uspatentcitation as patentcit_fromciting_tocited on patent.patent_id=patentcit_fromciting_tocited.citing_patent_id left outer join patent as citedpatent on patentcit_fromciting_tocited.cited_patent_id=citedpatent.patent_id

left outer join uspatentcitation as patentcit_fromcited_tociting on patent.patent_id=patentcit_fromcited_tociting.cited_patent_id left outer join patent as citingpatent on patentcit_fromcited_tociting.citing_patent_id=citingpatent.patent_id

left outer join uspc_current_mainclass_copy using(patent_id) left outer join uspc_current_copy using (patent_id, mainclass_id) left outer join location_uspc_mainclass on location.location_id=location_uspc_mainclass.location_id and uspc_current_mainclass_copy.mainclass_id=location_uspc_mainclass.mainclass_id left outer join uspc_mainclass on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.mainclass_id=uspc_mainclass.id left outer join uspc_subclass on uspc_current_copy.subclass_id=uspc_subclass.id

left outer join cpc_current_group_copy using(patent_id) left outer join cpc_group on cpc_current_group_copy.group_id=cpc_group.id left outer join cpc_current_copy using (patent_id, group_id) left outer join cpc_subsection on cpc_current_copy.subsection_id=cpc_subsection.id left outer join cpc_subgroup on cpc_current_copy.subgroup_id=cpc_subgroup.id left outer join location_cpc_group on location.location_id=location_cpc_group.location_id and cpc_group.id=location_cpc_group.group_id

left outer join nber_copy using(patent_id) left outer join location_nber_subcategory on location.location_id=location_nber_subcategory.location_id and nber_copy.subcategory_id=location_nber_subcategory.subcategory_id left outer join nber_subcategory on nber_copy.subcategory_id=nber_subcategory.id left outer join nber_category on nber_copy.category_id=nber_category.id
left outer join location_year on patent_inventor.location_id=location_year.location_id and patent.year=location_year.year
left outer join wipo on patent.patent_id=wipo.patent_id left outer join wipo_field on wipo.field_id=wipo_field.id

left outer join government_interest on patent.patent_id=government_interest.patent_id left outer join patent_govintorg on patent.patent_id=patent_govintorg.patent_id left outer join patent_contractawardnumber on patent.patent_id=patent_contractawardnumber.patent_id left outer join government_organization on patent_govintorg.organization_id=government_organization.organization_id
left outer join patent_lawyer ON patent_lawyer.patent_id=patent.patent_id left outer join lawyer on lawyer.lawyer_id=patent_lawyer.lawyer_id
left outer join patent_examiner on patent_examiner.patent_id=patent.patent_id left outer join examiner on examiner.examiner_id=patent_examiner.examiner_id
left outer join pctdata on pctdata.patent_id=patent.patent_id
